# Temple
## Overview
**Temple:** This elegant area offers everything you need to add a bit of religion to your life.

*Components:* [[Chapel, Fancy|Fancy chapel]], [[Library, Fancy|fancy library]] (includes books on religion, history, and nobility and royalty), [[Study_Office, Luxury|fancy office]], [[Storage, Fancy|fancy storage]]; *Size:* 5 stronghold spaces; *Cost:* 14,900 gp.

*Staff:* Acolyte; *Upkeep:* 30 gp per month.
